name: Radioactive Runner | Ludum Dare 40 Entry
description:
Description: Run through a nuclear power plant and jump and dodge tesla coils, fire sprayers, lead pipes, and much more in radioactive runner. You get radioactivity over time and when you hit an obstacle. Radioactivity makes the game harder as you get more.

Controls: Space - Jump (You have two), R - Restart (Only in “Game Over” screen)

Note: We had to publish early, so keep in mind that we had 24 hours less than the Jam provides.

The Team: Music+SoundFX - @furokfaragok, Programming - @Hydro-Games, and Graphics - @bananaguybob

Tools: Gamemaker Studio 2, Bfxr, Piskel, Aesprite, and Bosca Ceoil
